text:
Extremely affordable and delicious curry rice. Very value for money. Curry was very well balanced. $4 for chicken cutlet and curry veg.

A very popular hit with uncles in the estate. Give it a try.

3 chicken wing + 3 potatoes slices w sumptuous yellow noodles w thick gravy.

Everything at $4.00. Where to find another stall that sell nice curry chicken noodles in today times when many stalls inflated their prices.

Fresh chicken, sweet veggies curry and wow their curry taste not the same as others and is very thick.

Overall it is very value for money
Amazing curry really. This store doesnâ€™t deserve anything below 4 stars la come on.

Bought mutton curry with white rice. Only 5 small cubes of mutton plus 2-3 pcs of potatoes. Paid $8.40
Regret that I didn't take picture as I did not have my phone with me that night. Curry was tasteless and very watery. Service was friendly though. Mutton (meat) is so-so only. Wouldn't never never go back.
